壏字的基本解释

壏

坚硬结实的土。

壏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［làn］
［《廣韻》胡黤切，上檻，匣。］
堅土。《管子·地员》：“五怸之狀，廪焉如壏，潤溼以處。”尹知章注：“壏，猶彊也。”一说，壏假用为盐字，谓土状似盐。参阅郭沫若等《管子集校》。

壏字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壏； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页241第04
【廣韻】胡黤切【集韻】戸覽切，?音檻。堅土也。【管子·地員篇】纑土之次曰五壏，五壏之狀，芬焉若糠以肥。【註】地色黃而虛。　又【集韻】盧瞰切，音濫。壏埮，地平而長。　通作㯺。

壏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
壏字的起名意思

暂无。

壏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［làn］
["Guangyun" Hu Tie cut, upper threshold, box. ]
Hard soil. "Guanzi·Diyuan": "The shape of the five cons, the dimples are like dimples, where they can be wetted." Yin Zhizhang's note: "the dimples are strong." In one word, the dilemma is used as the word salt, which means that the shape of soil is like salt. See Guo Moruo et al. "Guanzi Collection School".
壏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　壏; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 241 04
[Guang Yun] Hu Tie cut [Ji Yun] To view and cut, the sound threshold. Hard soil also. [Guanzi·Diyuan Chapter] The second step of the soil is called the five gully, which is the shape of the five gully. Fenyan is like a chaff for fertilizer. [Note] The ground color is yellow and empty.　[Jiyun] Lu Kanqie, the sound is excessive. The ground is flat and long.　通作㯺.
